name: Psychological Warfare and PSN Social Exile
description: Dismantling the power of PSNs through targeted psychological operations and social exclusion tactics.

cards.title: Weaponizing Truth Against PSNs
cards.description: Using undeniable truth as a weapon to discredit and destabilize PSNs.
bulletpoints: Exposing contradictions in their messaging to erode credibility.
Using verified evidence to shatter their false narratives.
Amplifying internal dissent within their ranks.
cards.summaryText: Document every contradiction, blast the receipts where their followers canâ€™t ignore them, and magnify dissenting voices so the truth rots their credibility from the inside out.

cards.title: Socially Exiling PSN Leaders
cards.description: Creating social resistance strategies that cut off PSNs from influence.
bulletpoints: Encouraging groups to refuse engagement with known PSNs.
Building social structures that reject manipulative individuals.
Denying PSNs the attention and reaction they need to thrive.
cards.summaryText: Organize communities to cut them off cold, design networks that automatically shun manipulators, and starve them of the drama and attention that fuels their control.

cards.title: Reverse Psychological Targeting
cards.description: Redirecting PSN tactics back onto them for maximum disruption.
bulletpoints: Mirroring their manipulation methods to destabilize their confidence.
Using selective misinformation to lead them into self-destruction.
Forcing PSNs to question their own internal cohesion.
cards.summaryText: Reflect their tactics back at them until they second-guess every move, feed them tailored false leads that push them into reckless choices, and spark paranoia that fractures their alliances.
